caption: Fried Chicken & sweet potatoes were good. The Mac & Cheese was a HUGE miss. Definitely would not recommend if you like soupy mac.
First time trying Crazy Bird and I wonder what took me so long! The chicken was perfectly cooked and the sides were great too! 10/10

I'm always on the quest for perfect fried chicken and I may have just found it.  We drove from Indiana and it was well worth it.  I have never had fried chicken so juicy,flavorful, and fried to perfection. I also had the greens,sweet potatoes, and macaroni and they were absolutely delicious.  My husband had the chicken sandwich and it was humongous and packed with flavor.  My little one's had chicken strips that were humongous as well.  They are picky eaters and they gave their stamp of approval and even said they can't wait to come back🥰.  The fries were perfect (I mean PERFECT).  I also got a slice of hummingbird cake and it was UNBELIEVABLE 😍😍😍.  The lady at the counter was super, super friendly and made us feel right at home.  She was picking greens and it just made me think of my childhood 🥰.  This place is family friendly and truly a treasure.  I can't wait until next time.  Thanks again Crazy Bird,your food and service was Crazy Good👏👏👏
Best fried chicken in the city, hands down. Ribs are awesome. The sides are fantastic, especially the cole slaw, my favorite. Go see Larry ! Can't wait to try the chicken and waffles. aka KeyMarc
Great chicken!  Huge portions!  Larry is Fantastic!

Wonderful customer service! Yesterday we only received one of two bags for pick up. We didn't realize this until we got home and the manager Breanna offered to drive the other bag to us. This is our go-to chicken spot and I'm glad they went the extra mile for us!

I just picked up lunch and it was fantastic! Wings were crispy and the honey chipotle sauce was delicious! The chicken sandwiches were yummy, could be a bit crispier. The fries were to Die for! Will be back.
This is the best Fried chicken I have ever had! And it was worth the drive from Glenview IL! Parking was kinda hard but the food is really good! The fry’s are really good! I will come back!
My buddy Tony (from Costa Mesa) said he comes here almost every Monday to buy lunch for his bros!  Tony likes the spice and the over!
Awesome awesome food

We ordered the crazy bird sandwich and the grilled chicken ciabatta sandwich. The grilled chicken was dry, ciabatta bread was hard, the condiments were not tasting good and overall hard to eat. The crazy bird barely had any meat on it. The only saving grace was the sides. The sweet potato and the Mac and cheese were pretty good. If you want good chicken go to Fry the Coop nearby. I will not be going back.
Great Tasting chicken sandwich at good price!
Real good tender chicken at a fair price, thank you!
Very good chicken 👍😄👍🐔
Excellent customer service, food was delicious, great portions.

Larry Tucker must be some kind of crazy genius! We’ve eaten our way through Eater’s best fried chicken - but Crazy Bird’s takes the roost! The “original-style” Amish chicken is brined just right, and seasoned to perfection! This is a true chef’s fried chicken and not your run-of-the-mill 3 piece. And you can tell from every outstanding item on the menu: the fries, mac n cheese, and don’t get me started on the rib tips. The only thing that rivals Larry’s fried chicken is the caramel cake - which is so damn good that I’ve requested it for my birthday. Every bite of Crazy Birds is your birthday. Happy bday.
The food and services are EXCELLENT!!!!
Food was great and the price was right. The whole chicken wings were delicious. I really liked the plain wings without sauce. The seasoning was tasty and the batter was crispy.
Best Chicken, dessert AND dining experience I've had in a LONG time!! Run don't walk to this hidden gem!

Me and my husband tried their chicken for the first time last night. It was one of the best fried chickens we have ever had. We ordered 2 pieces 2 sides each, the portions were so big. We definitely found our favorite chicken place!!
Wow! What a great spot for Sunday brunch. Delicious food. Amazing service. I highly recommend it.

Very high quality wings, maybe my favorite in Chicago. Just tried the honey chipotle and the Tennessee Hot. Both flavors were incredible. Also, despite being carry out, the skin was still incredibly crispy. I’d recommend the whole wings, so much meat, great price. I will definitely be back.

solid chicken sandwich but even better hospitality. came in early ahead of my order being finished and the owner greeted me and gave me a bottle of water on the house. said he had been closed for the past 3 days, so support local black owned businesses and stop by when you have a chance

The chicken is crazy delicious! And so are the fries! The owner was so nice. He came out of the kitchen to say hi and even offered me some of their Korean sauce to try. My wife loved it! I guess I know what we are ordering the next time we go here
Great tasting chicken, huge portions, 5 stars.
Food is awesome chicken is juicy and seasoned good and All the sides are delicious!!

Absolutely amazing 👏 the chicken is perfectly cooked..seasoned and juicy..every bite taste good! Sweet potatoes,  mac n cheese,  greens, cole slaw, red beans n rice...omg...deeelicious!! I couldn't stop eating...the food is so good, wonderful owners..family owned 😁...eating this food reminds me of family!  I can't wait to try the rest of the menu...and the 🍋 pound cake 🤤. Do yourself a favor and order already 😏
Good chicken fest service
Chicken sandwich ok everything else out of this world unreal food get it and you will understand wish it was open past 10
Amazing food and people! Will be back.

Amazing chicken sandwich. The Mac and cheese coulda been better but I think I got the end of a batch. Probably my fault since it was close to closing time so I’ll give them a pass. The caramel cake was awesome though! Definitely will be back

The chicken flavor was great , crispyness was fantastic , but then sadly my chicken was bleeding . Uncooked raw middle .. Although they were very thoughtful ! Made my food over & gave me a few sweet treats . Don’t go before closing ...... warning . :)
2/2 on not giving us half the order, very frustrating considering the chicken is good - but too unreliable to return again.
Delicious.

Can only say great things about this place. Friendly service, perfect chicken - this is our go-to spot! Easily the best friend chicken place in Chicago, and way better than most of the trendy chicken spots out there.  I can't say enough about that chicken though. They have some secret fried chicken magic. The chicken is always perfectly seasoned, moist on the inside, crispety crunchety on the outside. Breading is never soggy and NEVER falls off. True fried chicken expertise.  And don't forget the sides. The Mac and cheese is amazing + collard greens + the coleslaw are my favorites.

Chef Larry Tucker is the most talented chef in Chicago that many have never heard of. Ask him sometime when you see him in the restaurant to tell you where he’s cooked over the years and he might tell you some fun stories. I met Larry when he had N&N Smokehouse in Irving Park in Lakeview. BBQ fans will remember NN as one of the best Chicago has had and thankfully Larry reprises some of his BBQ at Crazy Bird as specials. Lately Larry has focused on fried chicken for which he has a special gift. I’m from the South and to my taste there is none in Chicago that match his version. The crust is light but crunchy, perfectly seasoned; and the chicken itself is tender and juicy. Don’t miss the sides- red beans and rice, greens and the like. And his wife makes some great desserts. I’m friends with Larry as you might be able to tell, but I became a pal, a loyal customer and hired him to cater several times only after falling in love with his food.
It was good.
Everything was so fresh. The fries  were perfectly seasoned.

Yummy fried chicken friendly family wait staff in training, she made mix-ups on order but she so pleasant you couldn't be upset. I was upset because there was no humming bird cake😬 Mouth was watering for when I saw on menu.Thats OK I'll be back
So. Freaking. Good. Great prices amazing sauce and fries. Extremely friendly staff looks like they have a good brunch too. Highly recommend in an area with limited options. Will be back for sure!
The chicken is really good! Fantastic seasoning and sauce. Korean BBQ and Chipotle are perfect. Mac and Cheese is also on point. The staff has been very accommodating. Will return.

This place was amazing! I came in not knowing what to expect cause I was just passing by and my mind was blown! They have the best fried chicken ever aaaaand all the best sides! My collard greens and mac n cheese was SO GOOD! Not to mention they treated me like family! I loved every moment of being there! Not mention they now have Brunch on Sundays with mimosas and bellinis and bloody Mary's and even more! I cant wait to come back again, it was such a pleasant experience!
Incredible madeline couldn't be more wrong
Is this the same crazy bird that used to be on California
Perfect chicken, incredibly nice staff, cozy space. 💯 going back 😊
Lots of good chicken places and this is one of the best.!  My new fav.  Excellent.!  Crunchy tasty delish
Slow to cook.

Incredible! Chicken is so juicy and packed with flavor. Don't usually like coleslaw but it had flavor here and perfect balance. Owner and son I believe run a welcoming restaurant, can't wait to return.
Loved it. Pictured are chicken tenders, mac and cheese, and corn bread. Honey chipotle  dipping sauce.

Being naive to the menu i ordered the lunch special and received a supposed "jerk" chicken wrap with ranch sauce and other toppings?! Way too much going on for my liking. I specifically told the call taker that I was looking for fried chicken she rushed me off and said ok. Not planning on going back.
A great new chicken restaurant has opened up on Grand .The food was delicious ,lunch specials cheaper than almost anywhere. I can't wait to try the wings!
The owners here are extremely nice, and the food is very good. Prices are reasonable.
Delicious.
Super good food. Staff and owner are very nice and provide a great dining experience

Super glad to have another restaurant lunch option close to work. Been running on fumes with Bari, Butterfly, Salerno's etc. Finally made it in yesterday. Staff was super attentive and the owner came out and chatted us up. Super friendly and made great recommendations. Food came out pretty quickly, the owner hooked us up with some free fries which was a nice gesture to welcome us in. Food itself was really, really great. Ate literally everything put in front of us. Def excited to go back and try more. Highly recommend!
Best fried chicken I've ever had!!...im hooked!

Had the 7 ounce chicken sandwich with buffalo sauce and a side of macaroni and cheese. The macaroni and cheese was nothing special, but the sandwich was amazing. The meat was comprised of a single piece of chicken breast, flattened, breaded and fried to perfection. The buffalo style sandwich is topped with buffalo sauce, blue cheese, pickles and lettuce. The meat also seemed like it was in excess of 7 ounces, as the chicken breast had an overhang of one inch all around the sandwich. If you like the chicken sandwiches served at Chick-fil-A or Popeyes, give this place a try. I can guarantee that the sandwiches served at those fast food joints pale in comparison to the sandwiches served at this family run establishment.

If you are looking for crazy good chicken wings with exceptional customer service, this is the place to go. Good for large groups. The staff was great at making suggestions and the food came out in reasonable time.
I enjoyed the friendly service and conversations. It made the food more enjoyable. The chicken was crispy and great taste!
Great service and food and you feel welcomed and really friendly 👌🏽👌🏽
The BEST sweet tea in Chicago! Just like we drink it back home (I am from SC). Great food and friendly staff!

I have been around for a while, and I know my chicken.   Let me tell you, this is some of the best I've ever had.     The skin is perfectly crisp (not battered and gummy), and the meat is juicy.   I'm not sure if the bird was  broasted or fried, but it was done just right!  I'll be back!
SOOO GOOOD.. Made me feel like i was at a Family Reunion!!  Home cooking

You think you came for the fried chicken, which yes! is GOOD. great flavor and texture. I ended up falling for the fresh chicken in the salad and pickle sauce dressing. (home made ranch??) SO GOOD! glad to have the spot in the neighborhood. My coworkers and I will be back :)
very very good
We just stopped in to try the chicken and it really was fantastic! Tender, crisp, and full of flavor. Will be back soon!!
Came here for the second time today and the chicken is delicious for such a great price and the owners and staff are always so nice! Definitely going to be coming back!

Since the first visit, I was sold. The owner is really good people. They make a mean fried chicken cutlet sandwich,  (the regular is more than enough) and a heavenly Caramel cake that has left me yearning more with all other Caramel cakes (looking at you shark’s)  In addition to that, anytime I’ve waited for my food longer than 5 minutes they offer me a drink.  Keep on doing what you guys do, and you will continue to gain many loyal customers.
Most Excellent! Very Tasty Chicken!

This is a family owned business with excellent fried chicken. The owner, Larry, is really friendly and his sons work there.  The fried chicken breast I had was so juicy that I had to use a fork so the juices wouldn't burn my lip!  Definitely going to go back there. Oh btw, they fried chicken sandwich is $5.  Yes, that's not a typo, $5 for the delicious sandwich!  A must try!
When you get that first bite of pickle, you'll know.
Fresh Bird, great price!
Very good chicken sandwich. Great service!

Honey Chipotle wings are great! Korean sauce is just okay. Chicken is well cooked. Juicy not super salty. Mac and cheese wasn't my fav but not bad. BBQ sauce is really good too! Definitely going back to try other sauces and their sandwiches looked really good.

Love this place!  They just opened this location 2 months ago and the owners couldn't be nicer.   The chicken is delicious.   we had the pulled chicken, fried chicken and chix breast.  They brine the chicken which makes it super moist and tender.   Interesting sauces; I had the honey chipotle, yum.   The place is super cute, clean with high ceilings and comfortable seating.   This is not your average chicken shack!   5 + stars.
Service with a smile! Wings were great and I'm not easy to impress on wings. Crazy bird sandwich was tasty too. Coming back again for sure!
So happy to finally have good friend chicken in this part of town. Best of all it's a small family owned joint and best of all they are super nice.
Solid fried chicken sandwich for $5
The food is delicious and the prices are great. I'm a fan of spicy chicken, so my only qualm is that it wasn't spicy. But they have a bunch of different sauces you can add to get that extra kick!
Amazing food. Great prices. Great service!

I love this place! We went for a late lunch and had such an enjoyable experience. The chef and all of the staff members are so friendly and so awesome. My plate took a little longer than the rest of the food, so they brought me a free side of mac and cheese (without me asking). Our table sat and chatted for a while, and the chef brought us some complementary dessert to try while we hung out. Compared to other fried chicken places in the city, they have MUCH better prices for the same quality food. Super friendly, super delicious - we will be back!

If it ain't crazy good, it ain't crazy bird! Definitely truth in that. SO crispy. SO flavorful. SO juicy. Straight classic. If you take sides in the cornbread divide, note that their's is not sweet. I will be back to try more sides (and eat far too much chicken) in the near future!
I found the chicken bland at best I won't be back
Really delicious! But kind of a small place, gets packed pretty quickly and there is no additional seating. Great service!
Fried chicken was amazing!

I heard this was a great place. Went and Ordered and 30mins later still no food.  Went to the counter and found out they didn't even put our order through.  Cancelled order and asked for refund.  Such a shame we didn't get to try this.  Update..... I tried this place again and much better.  The food is delicious and well worth the wait.  Thank you!!!!
So tasty, friendly, and family fun!

Had the 8 piece chicken (no sides) and it was so juicy and delicious! the chicken comes with sauce, but the chicken tastes great without it.  also the chef and owner are really great.  the chef actually brought out some test sauce for me to try and it tasted great!  also he took my feedback very well.  If you plan to dine in, I recommend ordering before you come since they cook to order, otherwise, expect a 15-20 min wait.
Awesome owners!! Love this place. Would definitely come back again

Really high quality food, especially for the quick-serve prices! The rotisserie chicken is great, and it’s hard to find that in this area. The crazy fries are a perfect call if you really want to pig out, too!
The people who work there are very friendly and the food is delicious.. I got the fried chicken.. collard greens and rice and beans..and lemon cake.. I enjoyed all of it

This place was AWESOME! Reasonably priced, the sauces for the chicken were magic. The Roasted chicken was very lean and not greasy and the Mac and Cheese 10/10. Coleslaw 20/10. Cool environment and beautiful set up.  Thanks for a great experience!

Its called Crazy Chicken for a reason because its crazy good! The chicken is out of this world! Not your typical chicken place. Chef has some serious TLC when it comes to cooking this food. All handmade and you can taste the difference. Prices are very good and love the vibe in the restaurant. Will definitely be returning! Also kid friendly which is a plus! Kids loved the Chicken with mac and cheese! Oh man was that mac and cheese good. Got the crazy fries too. Holy portion!!! Amazing stuff. Cole slaw super creamy and great combo with chicken. Great place all around! Some good people that run this place! Keep up the good work guys!!!
I love this restaurant,  the owners are great.  The food and customer service is excellent
Great food and amazing service. Definitely a must go
This guy know what he's doing. From the chicken, chicken sandwich, rib tips and Fries. Everything tastes great. Try the Chipotle sauce
Trust
Super place food is great!and my friend husband got caught their playing games with another.
The Chicken has no taste to me it is bland tasteing. On the positive note it is freshly cooked . The owners are nice people .Larry spice the chicken up .
I love this place!! Great fried chicken and sauce .. truly finger licking good. Always fresh and seasoned to perfection. Excellent customer which is a plus, as long as they are there I will be too.
chicken sandwiches FIRE!! & RIB TIPS Friday-Sunday
Good food, great owners
Their Fried Chicken and Crazy Bird Crazy Good Fries are Amazing.
